articles.title: Baltimore Ravens to bolster running back ranks by signing ex-Raider Kenyan Drake, source confirms - ESPN
articles.description: RB Kenyan Drake, released by the Raiders last week, is expected to sign with the Baltimore Ravens on Tuesday, pending a physical exam, a source confirmed to ESPN.
articles.content:
